Class Monster

java.lang.Object
DungeonCharacter
Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Monster extends DungeonCharacter
This Monster class contains all additional instance methods the monster characters

    • Monster

      public Monster(String theName, double theHitPoint, int theAttackSpeed, double theHitChance, int theMinDamage, int theMaxDamage, double theHealChance, int theMaximumHealTime)
      Parameters:
      theName - character Name
      theHitPoint - the hit points
      theAttackSpeed - character attack speed
      theHitChance - Chance to hit
      theMinDamage - the minimum hit point
      theMaxDamage - the maximum hit point
      theHealChance - the chance to health
      theMaximumHealTime - Maximum time to heal

    • combatChoice

      int combatChoice(DungeonCharacter theEnemy)
      Process what should the monster do in the fight
      Parameters:
      theEnemy - the opponent it is fighting with
      Returns:
      the choice 0. Attack 1. Heal itself 2. Go frenzy (Increase damage dealt)

    • selfHeal

      double selfHeal()
      Monster self-heal itself Won't exceed maximum time heal
      Returns:
      the amount it healed return -1 if exceed the amount of time heal return 0 if fail to heal
